00017 XHTMLMaker* XHTMLMaker::instance()
00018 {
00019   if( !_instance ) _instance = new XHTMLMaker();
00020   return _instance;
00021 }
00022 
00023 XHTMLMaker::XHTMLMaker()
00024 {
00025 
00026   XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00027 
00028   DOMImplementation* imp =
00029     DOMImplementationRegistry::getDOMImplementation( _xs("ls") );
00030 
00031   const XMLCh* xhtml_s = _xs( "html" );
00032   const XMLCh* p_id = _xs( "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" );
00033   const XMLCh* s_id =
00034     _xs( "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd" );
00035 
00036   DOMDocumentType* typ =
00037     imp->createDocumentType( xhtml_s, p_id, s_id );
00038 
00039   const XMLCh* ns_uri = _xs( "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" );
00040 
00041   _doc = imp->createDocument( ns_uri, xhtml_s, typ );
00042 
00043   if( !_doc )
00044     {
00045       cerr << "Cannot create document" << endl;
00046       return;
00047     }
00048 
00049   _doc->setEncoding( _xs( "utf-8" ) );
00050   //_doc->setStandalone( true );
00051   _doc->setVersion( _xs( "1.0" ) );
00052 
00053   _page_started = false;
00054 
00055   _writer =
00056     ( (DOMImplementationLS*)imp )->createDOMWriter();
00057 
00058   if( !_writer )
00059     {
00060       cerr << "Cannot create DOM writer" << endl;
00061       return;
00062     }
00063 
00064 }
00065 
00069 
00070 XHTMLMaker::Node* XHTMLMaker::start( const string& title )
00071 {
00072 
00073   if( _page_started )
00074     {
00075       cerr << "Page already started" << endl;
00076       return (Node*)0;
00077     }
00078 
00079   _page_started = true;
00080 
00081   // Root element:
00082   Node* el_xhtml = _doc->getDocumentElement();
00083 
00084   // Head:
00085   Node* el_head = _doc->createElement( _xs( "head" ) );
00086   el_xhtml->appendChild( el_head );
00087 
00088   // Title:
00089   Node* el_title = _doc->createElement( _xs( "title" ) );
00090   el_head->appendChild( el_title );
00091   DOMText* txt_title = _doc->createTextNode( _xs( title ) );
00092   el_title->appendChild( txt_title );
00093 
00094   // Body:
00095   Node* el_body = _doc->createElement( _xs( "body" ) );
00096   el_xhtml->appendChild( el_body );
00097 
00098   return el_body;
00099 
00100 }

00106 XHTMLMaker::Node* XHTMLMaker::addNode( const string& name,
00107                XHTMLMaker::Node* parent,
00108                const AttrMap& attrs )
00109 {
00110   Node* el = _doc->createElement( _xs( name ) );
00111   parent->appendChild( el );
00112 
00113   for( AttrMap::const_iterator i = attrs.begin(); i != attrs.end();
00114    ++i )
00115     {
00116       el->setAttribute( _xs( i->first ), _xs( i->second ) );
00117     }
00118 
00119   return el;
00120 
00121 }
00122 
00126 
00127 void XHTMLMaker::addText( Node* parent, const string& data )
00128 {
00129   DOMText* txt = _doc->createTextNode( _xs( data ) );
00130   parent->appendChild( txt );
00131 }

00137 void XHTMLMaker::out()
00138 {
00139 
00140   //_writer->setNewLine( (const XMLCh*)( L"\n" ) );
00141 
00142   if( _writer->canSetFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTSplitCdataSections, true ) )
00143     {
00144       _writer->setFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTSplitCdataSections, true );
00145     }
00146 
00147   if( _writer->canSetFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTDiscardDefaultContent, true ) )
00148     {
00149       _writer->setFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTDiscardDefaultContent, true );
00150     }
00151 
00152   if( _writer->canSetFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTFormatPrettyPrint, true ) )
00153     {
00154       _writer->setFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTFormatPrettyPrint, true );
00155     }
00156 
00157   if( _writer->canSetFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTBOM, true ) )
00158     {
00159       _writer->setFeature( XMLUni::fgDOMWRTBOM, true );
00160     }
00161 
00162   //XMLFormatTarget* ftar = new StdOutFormatTarget();
00163   XMLFormatTarget* ftar = new LocalFileFormatTarget( "test.xhtml" );
00164   fflush( stdout );
00165   _writer->writeNode( ftar, *_doc );
00166   delete ftar;
00167 
00168   XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00169 
00170   _instance = 0;
00171 
00172 }
